changelogversion.changelogtext: Add shortcut to other Twitter apps on the notification. If your favorite app is not on the list, please contact me via @yslibnet.
Add shortcut for the Editor dialog. Now you can assign open editor action to gesture of launcher apps.
Add Footer. When tweeting from notification, footer will be automatically added before sending
Fix first tweet after enabling "tweet as a thread" mistakenly tweeted as a reply to the previous tweet
Tweak previous status behavior in editor dialog. Now only visible when "tweet as a thread" is enabled
